landing.title: Azure Media Services
landing.valueProp: Azure Media Services is an API that enables developers to build low latency live and on-demand video experiences

section.1.title: A full, end-to-end solution
section.1.description: Azure Media Services is a full solution that manages the ingestion, transcoding, packaging, and delivery of your live content, the same technology that powers Teams and LinkedIn.

section.2.title: Make your live content accessible, with real-time transcription
section.2.description: Automatic real-time transcription in 100+ languages without sacrificing latency.

section.3.title: Protect your content from upload to playback
section.3.description: With Azure Media Service's uncompromising commitment to privacy and security, you can enable viewing restrictions with Digital Rights Management, Geo-blocking, and URL token signing.

section.4.title: Deliver low latency live streaming at global scale
section.4.description: 4-7 seconds of delay, delivered to all your viewers, devices and platforms. Whether itâ€™s a dozen to millions of streams, you can rest assured your viewers will always watch with less buffering and watch your live streams near-realtime.

liveDemo.title: Try low latency live streaming
liveDemo.playerNotes: Current player is Shaka player version {{playerVersion}}. The burned-in timecode is generated during encoding using system clock time.
liveDemo.clockNotes: Be sure to sync your local system clock before evaluating end-to-end latency. Latency charts are not available on iOS at this time.

features.title: The most feature-rich low latency platform available

list.item: Low latency between 4-7 seconds at scale
Fallback to standard HLS for legacy clients
No proprietary player. Works in Shaka, Dash.js, HLS.js, Video.js, ExoPlayer and Apple AVPlayer.
Full HD 1080p 30fps with adaptive bitrates at low-latency
Low-latency automatic captions and subtitles available in 50+ languages
Time-shift (DVR) window support up to 6 hours
Simple live-to-VOD transition from the same URLs cached to the CDN
Choose your own CDN, or use the integrated Azure CDN
Monitor your events with Event Grid and Azure Monitor

industry.title: Enterprise
industry.headline: Build media applications for today's enterprise
industry.body: Add live and on-demand streaming easily to your enterprise applications. Broadcast and archive your company meetings from any source. Secure your media over your own networks with Microsoft's trusted Enterprise level features, Azure Active Directory authentication, encryption at rest, DRM and private networks.

industry.title: Live shopping
industry.headline: Sell your products
industry.body: Empower your sellers to connect with their audience whether it be up-votes or instant advertising of new products. Influential connections mold a brand in seconds.

industry.title: Fitness
industry.headline: Stay fit together
industry.body: Connect your athletes to one another. Build a leader board for everyone to keep track of their core movements.

industry.title: Government
industry.headline: Engage your community
industry.body: Broadcast and archive the actions of leaders and legislators. Inform communities on their own schedules through the use of on-demand streaming. Provide accessible streaming to your constituents through the use of live and on-demand transcription and subtitling.

industry.title: Education
industry.headline: Create learning hubs
industry.body: Elevate online learning with more interactivity. Inspire students to push their learnings with in-depth calls, raise their virtual hands, and foster their creativity.

industry.title: Energy
industry.headline: Deliver a clean energy future
industry.body: Inspire conference attendees to ask more questions and get hands on with the conference speakers. Build on the personal connection and dive deep into climate and clean energy.

industry.title: Healthcare
industry.headline: Empower patients
industry.body: Provide virtual care for patients and providers to get the best remote health care and avoid the unnecessary in-person contact. Give accessible care quickly and easily.

industry.title: Manufacturing
industry.headline: Improve production quality
industry.body: From the production line equipment to products, capture real time footage and data for a more efficient supply chain. Live stream with robotics for remote welding operations.

items.title: Direct Uploads
items.description: Upload content from an HTTP/S URL, Azure blob storage, or directly via the portal

items.title: Stream from any encoder
items.description: Live stream using any encoder that supports the RTMP/S protocol.

items.title: Wide-range of input file formats
items.description: We accept many types of input video file formats and codecs

items.title: Seamless live to VOD
items.description: Live events in Media Services have always supported instant live to VOD. Easily archive your live events, and stream VOD from the same CDN cache as your live event.

items.title: Clipping and highlights
items.description: Instantly generate highlights using dynamic manifest filters, or export clips from the encoder to share with external systems and services.

items.title: Stream live
items.description: Go live easily. Start a live transcoding or pass-through event, get the input RTMP URL and delivery LL-HLS or DASH immediately.

items.title: Monitor, notify and react
items.description: Media Services live events integrate with Azure Monitor and Event Grid to detect issues early, notify and respond to changes in your streaming.

items.title: Live captions
items.description: Reach your audience with real-time transcription in 50+ languages without sacrificing latency.

items.title: Any Input
items.description: We support most input video formats, including professional-grade ones such as H.264, H.265, and Apple ProRes.

items.title: Made-for-you Presets
items.description: AMS provides a dozens of built-in commonly-used encoding presets that you can choose from - or you can create your own custom ones.

items.title: Dynamic Packaging
items.description: Deliver adaptive-bitrate content in HLS and MPEG-DASH streaming protocol formats using our built in packaging capabilities.

items.title: Captioning and Subtitling
items.description: Get automatic speech-to-text transcribed captions and subtitles in 50+ different languages.

items.title: Content Protection
items.description: Encrypt your encoded content with AES-128 or any of the major DRM systems: Microsoft PlayReady, Apple FairPlay, or Google Widevine.

items.title: Content aware encoding
items.description: Stream the best versions of your content and save storage costs by allowing us to choose the perfect bitrates and resolution settings for your encodings with the content aware encoding presets.

items.title: Automatic scaling without reservation
items.description: Submit encoding jobs across multiple regions without the fear of limits. Media Services encoding automatically scales to meet your needs.

items.title: Static package and deliver from anywhere
items.description: Encode and output your content as static HLS or DASH files for streaming direct from any HTTP/S cloud storage or web server.

items.title: Encode with us, or upload your content
items.description: Encode with our content aware encoding preset to get the right results, or upload your own MP4 content to stream instantly.

items.title: Deliver HLS and DASH from the same stored MP4s
items.description: Save storage costs by storing a single set of MP4s and use the power of dynamic manifest to deliver both HLS and DASH from a single set of MP4 files.

items.title: Add Subtitles and Closed Captions
items.description: Add subtitles from WebVTT files, or use the built-in transcription presets to generate subtitle files using speech-to-text technology.

items.title: Add descriptive audio tracks
items.description: Provide accessibility by adding descriptive audio tracks to your streams

items.title: Instant highlights and clipping
items.description: Clip any live or on-demand video to any length you want using simple filters when publishing.

items.title: Stream live
items.description: Go live easily. Get the RTMP input URL and go

items.title: RTMP/RTMPS Input
items.description: Supports RTMP and RTMPS protocol for simple integration with live streaming software like OBS

items.title: Live captions
items.description: Real-time transcription in 50+ languages without sacrificing latency

items.title: Client SDKs and samples
items.description: Get started quickly with client SDKs and samples available for .NET, Node.js/Javascript, Python, Java, Go.

items.title: Manage your accounts in the Azure portal
items.description: Easy management in the portal of all account features, integrations, security and monitoring.

items.title: Private links
items.description: Enable private link support to securely access your Media Services accounts on your own private network.

items.title: Role-based access control
items.description: Enable role-based access control to lock down access to critical resources in your accounts.

items.title: Bring your own keys
items.description: Bring your own content keys for protected streaming, account encryption and storage account access.

items.title: Enable trusted storage with Managed Identities
items.description: Restrict access to your storage accounts with trusted storage and system or user assigned Managed Identity.

items.title: Encrypt all of your assets at rest
items.description: Use the default storage side encryption to encrypt all of your assets at rest, or bring your own key to control the encryption.

items.title: Fine grained security using Azure Policy
items.description: Enable fine-grained security settings using the built-in Azure Policy definitions for Media Services. Restrict outbound internet streaming and limit content delivery to your private network only.

freeLive.title: Get started with 5 hours of free live-streaming

tryFree.title: Try Azure Media Services for free
tryFree.description: Start with a free account for up to 20 minutes of free file encoding and 5 hours each of standard passthrough live, live transcription, and standard streaming endpoint. For unlimited encoding and live streaming, create an Azure Media Services account with your own Azure subscription.

customers.title: Customers
customers.subHeader: Trusted by the world's most ambitious streaming teams.
